channel.title: new! Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Father Spitzer and Doug Keck discuss Father?s book, ?Christ, Science, and Reason: What We Can Know about Jesus, Mary, and Miracles.? They discuss how the appearance of the Blessed Virgin to St. Bernadette at Lourdes and the many miracles now associated with the site. (60 minutes).
